verses.text: These \add are\add* the \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w* and \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, which ye shall \w observe|strong="H8104"\w* to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* thee to \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* it, all the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* that ye \w live|strong="H2416"\w* upon the \w earth|strong="H0127"\w*.

Ye shall \w utterly|strong="H0006"\w* \w destroy|strong="H0006"\w* all the \w places|strong="H4725"\w*, wherein the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* ye shall \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* \w served|strong="H5647"\w* their \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, upon the \w high|strong="H7311"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, and upon the \w hills|strong="H1389"\w*, and under every \w green|strong="H7488"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*:\f + \fr 12.2 \ft possess: or, inherit\f*

And ye shall \w overthrow|strong="H5422"\w* their \w altars|strong="H4196"\w*, and \w break|strong="H7665"\w* their \w pillars|strong="H4676"\w*, and \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* their \w groves|strong="H0842"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*; and ye shall hew \w down|strong="H1438"\w* the graven \w images|strong="H6456"\w* of their \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w destroy|strong="H0006"\w* the \w names|strong="H8034"\w* of them out of that \w place|strong="H4725"\w*.\f + \fr 12.3 \ft overthrow: Heb. break down\f*
Ye shall not do \w so|strong="H6213"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

But unto the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shall \w choose|strong="H0977"\w* out of all your \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* to \w put|strong="H7760"\w* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* there, \add even\add* unto his \w habitation|strong="H7933"\w* shall ye \w seek|strong="H1875"\w*, and thither thou shalt \w come|strong="H0935"\w*:

And thither ye shall \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* your burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w*, and your \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w*, and your \w tithes|strong="H4643"\w*, and heave \w offerings|strong="H8641"\w* of your \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and your \w vows|strong="H5088"\w*, and your freewill \w offerings|strong="H5071"\w*, and the \w firstlings|strong="H1062"\w* of your \w herds|strong="H1241"\w* and of your \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w*:

And there ye shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and ye shall \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* in all that ye \w put|strong="H4916"\w* your \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* unto, ye and your \w households|strong="H1004"\w*, wherein the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* thee.

Ye shall not \w do|strong="H6213"\w* after all \add the things\add* that we \w do|strong="H6213"\w* here this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* whatsoever \add is\add* \w right|strong="H3477"\w* in his own \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*.

For ye are not as yet \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w rest|strong="H4496"\w* and to the \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*, which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* you.

But \add when\add* ye go \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, and \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* giveth you to \w inherit|strong="H5157"\w*, and \add when\add* he giveth you \w rest|strong="H5117"\w* from all your \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, so that ye \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in \w safety|strong="H0983"\w*;

Then there shall be a \w place|strong="H4725"\w* which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shall \w choose|strong="H0977"\w* to cause his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* to \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* there; thither shall ye \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* all that I \w command|strong="H6680"\w* you; your burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w*, and your \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w*, your \w tithes|strong="H4643"\w*, and the heave \w offering|strong="H8641"\w* of your \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and all your \w choice|strong="H4005"\w* \w vows|strong="H5088"\w* which ye \w vow|strong="H5087"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*:  +  r 12.11  t your choice…: Heb. the choice of your vows *

And ye shall \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, ye, and your \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and your \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*, and your \w menservants|strong="H5650"\w*, and your \w maidservants|strong="H0519"\w*, and the \w Levite|strong="H3881"\w* that \add is\add* within your \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*; \w forasmuch|strong="H3588"\w* as he hath no \w part|strong="H2506"\w* nor \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* with you.
Take \w heed|strong="H8104"\w* to thyself that thou \w offer|strong="H5927"\w* not thy burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* in every \w place|strong="H4725"\w* that thou \w seest|strong="H7200"\w*:

But in the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w choose|strong="H0977"\w* in \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of thy \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w*, there thou shalt \w offer|strong="H5927"\w* thy burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w*, and there thou shalt \w do|strong="H6213"\w* all that I \w command|strong="H6680"\w* thee.

Notwithstanding thou mayest \w kill|strong="H2076"\w* and \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* in all thy \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*, whatsoever thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* lusteth \w after|strong="H0185"\w*, according to the \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* which he hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* thee: the \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* and the \w clean|strong="H2889"\w* may \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* thereof, as of the \w roebuck|strong="H6643"\w*, and as of the \w hart|strong="H0354"\w*.
Only ye shall not \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*; ye shall \w pour|strong="H8210"\w* it upon the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* as \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.

¶ Thou \w mayest|strong="H3201"\w* not \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* within thy \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* the \w tithe|strong="H4643"\w* of thy \w corn|strong="H1715"\w*, or of thy \w wine|strong="H8492"\w*, or of thy \w oil|strong="H3323"\w*, or the \w firstlings|strong="H1062"\w* of thy \w herds|strong="H1241"\w* or of thy \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*, nor any of thy \w vows|strong="H5088"\w* which thou \w vowest|strong="H5087"\w*, nor thy freewill \w offerings|strong="H5071"\w*, or heave \w offering|strong="H8641"\w* of thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*:

But thou must \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* them \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* in the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shall \w choose|strong="H0977"\w*, thou, and thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, and thy \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, and thy \w manservant|strong="H5650"\w*, and thy \w maidservant|strong="H0519"\w*, and the \w Levite|strong="H3881"\w* that \add is\add* within thy \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*: and thou shalt \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* in all that thou \w puttest|strong="H4916"\w* thine \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* unto.

Take \w heed|strong="H8104"\w* to thyself that thou \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* not the \w Levite|strong="H3881"\w* as long as thou \w livest|strong="H3117"\w* upon the \w earth|strong="H0127"\w*.\f + \fr 12.19 \ft as long…: Heb. all thy days\f*

¶ When the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shall \w enlarge|strong="H7337"\w* thy \w border|strong="H1366"\w*, as he hath \w promised|strong="H1696"\w* thee, and thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, I will \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, because thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w longeth|strong="H0183"\w* to \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*; thou mayest \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, whatsoever thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* lusteth \w after|strong="H0185"\w*.

If the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* to \w put|strong="H7760"\w* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* there be too \w far|strong="H7368"\w* from thee, then thou shalt \w kill|strong="H2076"\w* of thy \w herd|strong="H1241"\w* and of thy \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*, which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* thee, as I have \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* thee, and thou shalt \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* in thy \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* whatsoever thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* lusteth \w after|strong="H0185"\w*.

Even as the \w roebuck|strong="H6643"\w* and the \w hart|strong="H0354"\w* is \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w*, so thou shalt \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* them: the \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* and the \w clean|strong="H2889"\w* shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \add of\add* them \w alike|strong="H3162"\w*.

Only be \w sure|strong="H2388"\w* that thou \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* not the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*: for the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \add is\add* the \w life|strong="H5315"\w*; and thou mayest not \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* the \w life|strong="H5315"\w* with the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*.\f + \fr 12.23 \ft be…: Heb. be strong\f*
Thou shalt not \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* it; thou shalt \w pour|strong="H8210"\w* it upon the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* as \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.

Thou shalt not \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* it; that it may go \w well|strong="H3190"\w* with thee, and with thy \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* thee, when thou shalt \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \add that which is\add* \w right|strong="H3477"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Only thy holy \w things|strong="H6944"\w* which thou hast, and thy \w vows|strong="H5088"\w*, thou shalt \w take|strong="H5375"\w*, and \w go|strong="H0935"\w* unto the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w choose|strong="H0977"\w*:

And thou shalt \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* thy burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w*, the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* and the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: and the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of thy \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w* shall be poured \w out|strong="H8210"\w* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and thou shalt \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*.

\w Observe|strong="H8104"\w* and \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* all these \w words|strong="H1697"\w* which I \w command|strong="H6680"\w* thee, that it may go \w well|strong="H3190"\w* with thee, and with thy \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* thee \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*, when thou \w doest|strong="H6213"\w* \add that which is\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* and \w right|strong="H3477"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

¶ When the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shall cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee, whither thou \w goest|strong="H0935"\w* to \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* them, and thou \w succeedest|strong="H3423"\w* them, and \w dwellest|strong="H3427"\w* in their \w land|strong="H0776"\w*;\f + \fr 12.29 \ft succeedest…: Heb. inheritest, or, possessest them\f*

Take \w heed|strong="H8104"\w* to thyself that thou be not \w snared|strong="H5367"\w* by \w following|strong="H0310"\w* them, \w after|strong="H0310"\w* that they be \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee; and that thou \w enquire|strong="H1875"\w* not after their \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, How did these \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* their \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*? even so will I \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w likewise|strong="H1571"\w*.\f + \fr 12.30 \ft by…: Heb. after them\f*

Thou shalt not \w do|strong="H6213"\w* so unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: for every \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w* to the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, which he \w hateth|strong="H8130"\w*, have they \w done|strong="H6213"\w* unto their \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*; for even their \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and their \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* they have \w burnt|strong="H8313"\w* in the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* to their \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*.  +  r 12.31  t to the: Heb. of the *

What \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* soever I \w command|strong="H6680"\w* you, \w observe|strong="H8104"\w* to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* it: thou shalt not \w add|strong="H3254"\w* thereto, nor \w diminish|strong="H1639"\w* from it.
